duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain sample and component inventory on Grovesite tracking platform – to be updated daily/weekly upon receipt of new samples.
Unpack, photograph, weigh, and properly tag all incoming samples.
Verify product data from overseas vendors against the physical samples.
Assist with table lamp shading as directed by designers.
Assist movement of samples during in-house or on location photography sessions.
Prepare Showroom Orders for Visual Team including repacking samples and palletizing order.
Assist Visual Team with showroom set-ups as needed. (Domestic travel may be requested).
Maintain a well-organized and tidy Product Development sample area.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or GED with a minimum of 2 years work experience with a general understanding of the warehouse shipping, receiving, inventory and/or production areas.
Background in home furnishings industry preferred.
Physically capable to unpack, assemble, move and rebox new samples.
Flexibility to travel to assist showroom set up as needed (On feet all day, comfortable going up and down ladders for a full day).
